project_plan.name: Weather Information Fetcher
project_plan.description: Implement a Python program to fetch current weather information for a specified city using a public weather API.

task.name: Set up the project environment and install required libraries (e.g., requests)
Implement the functionality to fetch weather data from the public API
Parse the fetched data to extract temperature, humidity, and weather conditions
Display the weather information in the terminal
Write tests for the fetching and parsing functionality
Execute tests on the implemented features to ensure they function correctly
